Package gov.ornl.keva.table

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FilterBucketIterator
    Iterate through tables values, but filter out "tentative" values, and apply the pruning options.
    SafeTableValueHistory
    Store a history of values.
    SortedBucket
    A sorted bucket keeps all independent values in sorted order.
    TableAttributes
    Hold data attributes, such as type, owner, security, etc.
    TableBucket
    A table bucket keeps track of a history of independent values.
    TableBucketCollapser
    Collapse a bucket of values into the minimum number of independent values.
    TableBucketFactory
    Create table bucket instances.
    TableDeleteOp
    Represents a table delete operation.
    TableEmbedded
    Simple table value implementation that stores the data as an array of bytes.
    TableExternal
    Used for data that is stored locally in a file.
    TableKey
    Table keys uniquely identify a set of table values in the memtable and sstables.
    TableKeyFactory
    Helper class to construct table keys.
    TableValue
    Base class for all table values.
    TableValueFactory
    Generate table values.
    TableValueHistory
    Store a history of values.
    UnsafeBucket
    A non-thread-safe bucket implementation used by the sstable readers.
    UnsafeTableValueHistory
    Store a history of values.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TableBucket.Constraint
    Bucket implementation constraints.
